message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,400,000. It's a great deal, considering its value to you. Let me know what you think.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,300,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. While I understand your budget, $1,300,000 is still below my minimum acceptable price.  I'm willing to come down to $1,350,000. This is a fair price considering the value you'll be getting. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but unfortunately, $1,350,000 is still out of my range. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,300,000. I hope this might be closer to what you're willing to accept.
